_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The exposition of the teaching on burnin: Mutilating the eye faculty with a red-hot iron nail
Mutilating the ear faculty with a sharp iron spike
Mutilating the nose faculty with a sharp nail cutter
Mutilating the tongue faculty with a sharp razor
Mutilating the body faculty with a sharp spear
The impermanence of the sense faculties: The eye, sights, eye consciousness, and eye contact are impermanent
The ear, sounds, ear consciousness, and ear contact are impermanent
The nose, smells, nose consciousness, and nose contact are impermanent
The tongue, tastes, tongue consciousness, and tongue contact are impermanent
The body, touches, body consciousness, and body contact are impermanent
The mind, thoughts, mind consciousness, and mind contact are impermanent
The disillusionment and freedom of a nob: Disillusionment with the sense faculties and their objects
Understanding of the end of rebirth and completion of the spiritual journey
